Descendants of John Richardson Leake Sr. (1869-1937) June 22, 2012 20 days since our celebration.
HAPPY 4th OF JULY LEAKE FAMILY
We are now on facebook click below
Leake Family Reunion was held June 2012 in Sugar Land, Texas . The Leake - Richardson - Carpenter - Miller - Freeman - Rice - Crawford - Alford - Anderson - Collins - Echols - Henderson - Lane - Matthews - Nesbit - Spencer - Smith - West - W hite - Wilkerson - Williams Families
